title: Nuclear Physics and Radioactivity

vocab.definition: Spontaneous emission of radiation from unstable atomic nuclei
Helium nucleus consisting of two protons and two neutrons
High-energy electron or positron emitted from nucleus
High-energy electromagnetic radiation from nuclear transitions
Time required for half of radioactive nuclei to decay

teachingNotes: Emphasize safety aspects of radiation. Use decay curves to illustrate half-life concepts.
